channel.title: CVE Feed for Kubernetes -- Kubernetes Secrets Store CSI Driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kubernetes -- Kubernetes Secrets Store CSI Driver

item.title: CVE-2020-8567|2024-09-16T18:23:40.732Z -- kubernetes -- kubernetes%20secrets%20store%20csi%20driver
item.description: Kubernetes Secrets Store CSI Driver Vault Plugin prior to v0.0.6, Azure Plugin prior to v0.0.10, and GCP Plugin prior to v0.2.0 allow an attacker who can create specially-crafted SecretProviderClass objects to write to arbitrary file paths on the host filesystem, including /var/lib/kubelet/pods.
